title: Message Row
description: Individual scheduled message row in OnlyFans Mass Message schedule

row_number.description: Sequential row number (starts at 2 for CSV compatibility with headers)

schedule_type.description: REQUIRED: MUST be 'Mass Message' for ALL rows (no exceptions)

message_type.description: Type of message in the funnel

time_pst.description: Scheduled time in PST (H:MM AM/PM format, e.g., '9:07 AM')

caption.description: Full message caption text (50-100+ words for PPV, shorter for bumps/follow-ups)

recommended_price.description: Price recommendation: '$XX' for Unlock, '.' for Photo bump, empty/null for Follow up

oneOf.description: Empty string for Follow up messages
Null for Follow up or placeholder bumps

caption_id.description: Caption ID from caption_bank (required for Unlock/Photo bump from bank, null for Follow ups or generated content)
